LOGIN_FAILED: Email or password is incorrect.Try again or click Forgot password to reset it.
PASSWORD_MIN_CHARACTER_VALIDATION: Use 8 characters or more for your password
RECOVERY_TRUE: The password reset link has been sent to the Email
RECOVERY_FAILED: Password recovery failed. Please make sure the email you entered is correct.
NEWPASSWORD_TRUE: The password has been updated, After 3 seconds will return to the Login Page
NEWPASSWORD_FAILED: Password change failed, the password must be at least 8 characters which must include alphanumeric characters and special characters.
CHANGE_TRUE: The password has been updated, After 3 seconds will return to the Homepage
CHANGE_FAILED: Password change failed, Please make sure you enter the old password correctly
